amendment.description: Amendment strikes section 8122 regarding the prohibition of the transfer of funds to the National Sea Based Deterrent Fund.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike section 8122 regarding the prohibition of the transfer of funds to the National Sea Based Deterrent Fund.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Forbes amendment (A031) Agreed to by recorded vote: 321 - 111 (Roll no. 339).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
